## ProgramBuilder.unpack2x16float() method

Same as unpack2x16float builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
unpack2x16float(x: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
